name: Robottoni Battleground
description:
Enter the robottoni battleground, a turn-based strategy game set in a clandestine arena of robot combat. Play online with friends , or against AI.

instruct your units using action commands with:

Q: Turn left

W: Go forward

E: Turn Right

R:  Attack

T: Wait

Y: Insult

U: Piston sound. Feature will release in 1.1

ENTER: Send the commands for the robots to execute

The fastest player will start the turn.

Destroy all the opposing Robottoni, and be the real Swaggeroni.
